message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. To make this opportunity more attractive, I am proposing a special introductory price of $10800 for you. This is a fantastic deal considering the value it brings. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
